description:
100 Face CG from RTK13 for use through [Register Original Officer]. 
Enjoy numerous officer Face graphics from RTK13, the game that commemorated the 30th anniversary of the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS series. 

[To Use]
Select  [Editor]-[Register Orig. Officer] or [Edit Historical Officers]  from the Start Menu. On the next screen, select [Portrait]. A list of the face graphics will be displayed. Choose the desired officer CG from the [Special] tab.
name: "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII" Officer CG Set
